rules: Use Inter for all body text, inputs, and data tables.
Use font-medium or font-semibold for data values to make them pop.

primary.description: Vibrant Coral - Use for primary actions, active states, and key highlights.

secondary.description: Soft Slate/Blue Grey - Use for secondary buttons, backgrounds.

accent.description: Pale Coral - Use for active item backgrounds, subtle highlights.

usage_rules: Do NOT use the primary coral for large backgrounds. Use it for buttons, icons, and data points.
Use the 'accent' color (pale coral) for selected states in sidebars or lists.
Text on primary color must be white.
Dashboard cards should be white with a subtle border, not colored.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-full font-medium shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-6 rounded-full font-medium transition-all

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border shadow-sm p-6
cards.interactive: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border shadow-sm p-6 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors cursor-pointer

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-lg border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.empty_states: Use a light gray circle bg with a coral icon in the center for empty states.

charts.style: Minimalist, no grid lines (or very subtle), rounded bar ends, smooth curves for line charts.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette (Coral Primary).
2. Refactor the Sidebar to be collapsible and use the new 'accent' color for active states.
3. Redesign the Dashboard to use a Bento Grid layout with 'Cards' that have hover lift effects.
4. Implement the 'Reports' page using Recharts. Create at least 3 charts: Task Status (Pie), Tasks Completed vs Pending (Bar), and Efficiency Trend (Area).
5. Add Framer Motion to the main layout to animate page transitions.
6. Ensure all buttons use the 'pill' shape (rounded-full) for a modern feel.
7. Use the provided image URLs for any 'Team' or 'Welcome' widgets.
8. Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do NOT use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects for sticky headers.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
